r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: * PCBC-518: Detect and cleanup connections left in bad state * PCBC-525: Fix memory leak for schemaless connspec * PCBC-497: Add health check functions * PCBC-524: Fix memory leak when using authenticateAs() * PCBC-520: Add example for authentication with x.509 certificate * PCBC-522: Check username/password for NULL in Classic Authenticator * PCBC-516: Append information about runtime to HELLO string
